channel.title: enumeration on Always Developing
channel.description: Recent content in enumeration on Always Developing

item.title: Enumeration on a custom class
item.description: Daily Knowledge Drop To enable enumeration on a class (ability to foreach on the class), the only requirement is for a method named GetEnumerator to exist on the class. There is no requirement for the class to implement any interface (IEnumerable, IEnumerator etc), just the presence of the method is enough. Without GetEnumerator Last week we looked at adding indexing to a class - adding enumeration is similar, so we’ll use similar examples.
